body.name: LTPDE Smart Watches for Men Women(Answer/Make Calls) 1.83" Fitness Tracker with Sleep Heart Rate Monitor,IP68 Waterproof Fitness Watch with Step Calorie Counter Sleep Monitoring Pedometer Watch, Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 5 hrs 20 mins
features: 【Always Connected, Anywhere You Go】Discover the LTPDE Smartwatch, a revolutionary device equipped with a built-in speaker that lets you answer calls and groove to music directly from your wrist. Stay informed with message notifications and social media alerts (Facebook, WhatsApp, Instagram, Twitter, etc.) delivered right to your wrist. Never miss an important call or message while on the move or during your workouts, even when your phone is tucked away.

【Express your unique style】The innovative design allows you to customize the watch face, and the smart watches has more than 100 cloud watch faces to choose from, suitable for various occasions and moods. Whether you prefer simple, fashionable or sporty style, you can find the perfect match in mens smart watches to show your personality and make time more interesting.

【Empower your lifestyle】 Embrace a smarter, more efficient lifestyle with this versatile fitness tracker. Experience a range of essential everyday functions such as alarm clock, stopwatch, music control, weather forecast, breathing exercises, find your phone, camera control and more. Easily pairs with most iOS 9.0 and Android 5.0 and above smartphones to fit seamlessly into your daily life, delivering unparalleled functionality and convenience.

【Track Your Progress】 Our Smart Watch for Men offers an impressive range of 100+ sports modes, catering to various sports enthusiasts. Whether you're walking, running, cycling, skipping, engaging in badminton, basketball, soccer, yoga, or more, reloj inteligente para hombre diligently records your exercise data, including steps, heart rate, calories, and distance. men's smart watches With an IP68 waterproof rating, wear it confidently in any weather or during intense workouts.

【Ready for Action】This smartwatch features an ultra-high-capacity, energy-saving battery that can be easily charged with the included magnetic charger. Battery life is approximately 3~7 days with normal use and can be extended up to 20 days in standby mode. Tailor your experience to suit your preferences by customizing brightness, vibration and wrist wake settings. When using it for the first time, please make sure the watch is fully charged for about 2 hours.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Explore the Cutting-Edge Smartwatch Experience This smartwatch has cutting-edge technology at your fingertips for a seamless, connected experience. From Bluetooth calling to health tracking, everything you need is just a touch away from your smart watch. Your wrist, the center of functionality Smart watches have functions such as fitness, health, music and more. No matter your lifestyle, our smartwatches can fit your needs. Stay informed, organized and entertained with ease. Smart features make life hassle-free The smart watches for men has useful tools like SOS, health insights, and find your phone. Modern technology and simplicity are combined to create a smarter and more convenient life.

Smart watch, control calls and messages with one hand The Bluetooth calling function allows you to make smooth calls anytime and anywhere without disturbing your activities. Answer, make calls and chat, all under the control of your activity trackers and smartwatches.The message reminder function will remind you immediately when there is news, allowing you to keep up with the pulse of information and not miss any important information. How to Enable Message Notifications？ Connect your smartwatch to your phone and open the "GloryFit" app. And bundled with the GloryFit app.Within the "GloryFit" app on your phone, navigate to Devices > Message and App Notifications and ensure both functions are enabled.Grant necessary permissions: Make sure your phone grants necessary permissions to the smartwatch and the "GloryFit" app, including access to notifications, contacts, or other relevant settings.Once permissions are granted, the smartwatch will automatically sync message notifications from your phone and display them on the screen.

Smart watches have multiple exercise modes to help you exercise smartly Multiple exercise modes make your exercise smarter and more efficient. No matter what kind of sport you are passionate about, reloj inteligente para hombrecan accurately track and provide you with customized sports data and guidance.Additionally, the IP68 waterproof design ensures you keep working even during intense sports or water activities How to Activate the Sports Mode on Your Smartwatch and Set Goals to View Data？ Connect the smart watch to your phone and open the "GloryFit" app. In the "GloryFit" app, find the option for "Sports" or "Workout" mode. Click it to enter.Select the specific sport or activity you want to track, such as running, biking, or walking.Start an activity on your smartwatch by tapping the corresponding button on the screen.During the activity, your smart watch will display real-time data such as heart rate, distance, duration and more related to the selected sport.Set goals: In exercise mode or after completing an activity, you can set goals for future workouts.

Your 24/7 health partner Monitor your health 24/7 with our advanced fitness tracker. Keep an eye on your sleep rate. Take control of your health and make informed decisions to live a balanced and healthy life. How to monitor sleep patterns and view data using a smartwatch? Wearing: Gently wear the smart watch on your wrist to ensure comfort, fit, firmness and stability, allowing you to monitor health data at any time.Easily monitor and view data: Turn on the corresponding function in the watch, sleep mode, and easily view real-time data. You can also analyze your health data in detail through the "GloryFit" app to understand your health status.

Real-time activity monitoring to understand life trajectory Smart watches are equipped with advanced sensor technology that can accurately monitor your daily activity data such as step count, exercise trajectory, and calorie consumption in real time , all sports data is at your fingertips. Intelligent control, full recording of activities Wear the smart watch on your wrist to ensure a comfortable fit and be ready to record your activity data at any time.Open the watch interface to view daily activities, record every healthy moment, and completely record the activity process.

Empower Your Day, Month-Long Battery Life! Our smartwatches feature long-lasting standby time so you can experience uninterrupted connectivity. With an efficient, long-lasting battery, you can seize every moment with confidence without worrying about frequent recharging. Stay ahead, stay active, and stay in control all month long on a single charge. The power is in your hands! Play Music at Your Fingertips Enjoy your favorite tunes anytime, anywhere with our smartwatch's music playback feature. Control your music library with a simple tap on your wrist. Whether you're in the gym, out for a run, or just relaxing, the power to set the perfect soundtrack for your day is right at your fingertips. Let the music play and elevate your every moment. AI voice assistant-your good helper Seamlessly go about your day with the AI voice assistant feature on our smartwatches. Just speak your command or question and our smart assistant will provide you with the information you need. From setting reminders and answering queries to guiding you through your schedule, your AI voice assistant is here to help. Capture the moment instantly - your personal photographer Easily take photos on your phone using quick commands from your smartwatch. No need to set a timer or ask someone to click for you. Just position your phone, compose your shot, and instruct your smartwatch to take the photo. Instant photography becomes effortless!

How to connect a smartwatch to your phone to make calls？ To connect your smartwatch to your phone and use the calling feature, follow these steps: Start by downloading and installing the "GloryFit" app on your mobile device. "GloryFit" APP is compatible with iOS 11.0 and Android 5.0 or higher.Activate Bluetooth on your phone and log in to the APP to enter the home page.Pair your smartwatch with the app. During the pairing process, ensure seamless communication between the watch and the App to achieve data synchronization. Open the app, navigate to Devices, and select Add New Device. Select T19F from the options. How to pair your smartwatch and enable calling？ Once pairing is complete, you can activate the Call feature from the menu on your Android smartwatch. Once connected, you can easily receive and make calls directly from your smartwatch without having to retrieve your phone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stylish and Sleek Design, Comfortable
reviews.reviewText: Just bought this recently. I must say, it has exceeded my expectations. Great design, The high-qualityband gives it a premium feel, making it suitable for both casual and formal occasions. The colors are rich and vivid, making notifications, fitness tracking data, and watch faces look stunning. It has an impressive battery life for its price. The Mobile app is pretty easy to use and self explanatory.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great choice for your first smart watch!
reviews.reviewText: This thing is so great for the price! Obviously it’s not going to have every bell and whistle but it works perfectly well. It’s a little too big for my wrist (just looks wide, the band fits just fine) but I got it for my fiance and it fits him nicely. Pairing with the app was a breeze. The construction of it is so nice, I was impressed with the quality as soon as I opened the box. The band is very comfortable and the watch sits on my wrist nicely. Overall this is a great choice for an affordable smart watch!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value and User friendly
reviews.reviewText: As my inaugural smartwatch experience, I must say I'm thoroughly pleased with this device. It's user-friendly and aesthetically appealing. The affordability combined with its multitude of features makes it a worthy investment. The pairing procedure with my smartphone was a breeze - just a few taps and it was seamlessly connected. Navigating through its various apps is surprisingly intuitive, even for someone who occasionally struggles with technology. Overall, the setup process is straightforward, it boasts an array of practical features, and its design is impressive. I highly recommend this smartwatch as an excellent purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple design , high performance and technology, health and fitness
reviews.reviewText: I like this watch ; I have tried plenty of watches recently being an athlete and always track my steps and fitness data . The technology and style that this smart watch offer is one is the best I have used . I like the feature of Bluetooth calling , health tracking . It never disconnect , keeps me effortlessly connected. I do a lot of fitness activities and need to track my health, so it’s a great took for both my sports and music as well . This watch is very simple but modern simplicity for a smarter life.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent combination of price and quality
reviews.reviewText: This watch was chosen due to the experience of buying and operating such watches. And they fully met my expectations. Added a lot of functions that were not in my watch two years ago and most importantly the ability to make and answer phone calls. Very accurate medical measurement sensors, which is surprising. Even the measurement of blood pressure almost coincided with the measurement on the reference device. The workmanship is no worse than that of much more expensive watches.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This watch is nice looking and handy. The only thing I dont like is how fast the battery goes out. I could have it fully charged and it will need to be charged again 2 days later. Also, i dont get notifications of social media or text. Only social media that pops up is youtube.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It works but....
reviews.reviewText: I love the look and the point of the watch. My only complaint is that when I have it paired to my phone, it will pick up some text messages from only a couple numbers. It won't notify of messages from every person on my phone. The phone call feature is nice and better than expected!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great gift for someone
reviews.reviewText: So I got this watch for my mom for Christmas because her Apple Watch was burning her arm. She wanted a smart watch that would track her steps and workouts but the Fitbit wasn’t enough. I bought this because it wasn’t super expensive and it had free returns but no need because she LOVES IT! This smart watch is very similar to the Apple Watch in the sense that it has the big face to read texts and track workouts and all the other stuff. She is also able to answer phone calls and she comes in clearly through the watch. It has been her favorite watch so far and she said it was the best gift ever.
